settings.heading: Marley Kitchen x Spiceology
settings.content: Marley Kitchen and the Marley brand honors the timeless values of Bob Marley by uniting people around the world under the banner of One Love; they seek to share the soul and spirit of the Caribbean – a melting pot of cultures, ethnicities, and flavors.

settings.heading: About Marley Kitchen
settings.text:
Marley Kitchen and the Marley brand honors the timeless values of Bob Marley by uniting people around the world under the banner of One Love; they seek to share the soul and spirit of the Caribbean – a melting pot of cultures, ethnicities, and flavors.

Working with Cedella Marley and the Marley family, Spiceology has collaborated with Marley Kitchen to develop Caribbean-inspired blends: One Heart Jamaican Curry Blend, One Love Hemp Heart & Honey Ginger Butter Blend, and One World Cardamom & Coconut BBQ Blend.
